meanings.sent1: The movie's unnuanced plot made it easy for even young children to understand.
meanings.sent2: Her unnuanced painting style used bold colors and simple shapes.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's unnuanced jokes were so basic that they made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His unnuanced approach to problem-solving was like using a sledgehammer to crack a nut.
meanings.sent5: The unnuanced explanation was as clear as a cloudless sky.

meanings.definition: Not differentiated or nuanced; lacking in complexity.
meanings.sent1: The unnuanced flavors of the soup made it taste bland and boring.
meanings.sent2: His unnuanced understanding of the topic led to oversimplified conclusions.
meanings.sent3: The unnuanced puzzle was so easy that even a toddler could solve it.
meanings.sent4: Her unnuanced view of the world was like seeing everything in black and white.
meanings.sent5: The unnuanced design lacked depth and detail.
